statements: ALTER TABLE Nonprofit ADD COLUMN location VARCHAR(255)
ALTER TABLE Nonprofit MODIFY COLUMN established_date YEAR
ALTER TABLE Nonprofit DROP COLUMN mission
ALTER TABLE nonprofit_organization ADD COLUMN phone_number VARCHAR(20);
ALTER TABLE donations ADD COLUMN payment_method VARCHAR(50);
ALTER TABLE donations DROP COLUMN donation_date;
ALTER TABLE Nonprofit.Organization ADD COLUMN org_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE Nonprofit.Project ADD COLUMN project_description TEXT;
ALTER TABLE Nonprofit.Donation MODIFY COLUMN donation_amount DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE nonprofit.donor ADD COLUMN phone_number VARCHAR(15);
ALTER TABLE nonprofit.organization MODIFY COLUMN mission_statement TEXT NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE nonprofit.volunteer DROP COLUMN contact_number;
ALTER TABLE nonprofit.organization ADD COLUMN contact_person VARCHAR;
ALTER TABLE nonprofit.project ADD COLUMN start_date DATE;
ALTER TABLE nonprofit.member ADD COLUMN phone_number VARCHAR;
